creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
text:
When transforming the documents attached below in MIF I obtain this error (PDF, 
etc. works fine, maybe with some artifacts but works):

java.lang.RuntimeException: java.util.NoSuchElementException
        at org.apache.xalan.transformer.TransformerImpl.run(TransformerImpl.java
:3170)
        at org.apache.xalan.transformer.TransformerHandlerImpl.endDocument(Trans
formerHandlerImpl.java:433)
        at org.apache.xerces.parsers.SAXParser.endDocument(SAXParser.java:1225)
        at org.apache.xerces.validators.common.XMLValidator.callEndDocument(XMLV
alidator.java:760)
        at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLDocumentScanner$EndOfInputDispatcher.d
ispatch(XMLDocumentScanner.java:1546)
        at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLDocumentScanner.parseSome(XMLDocumentS
canner.java:381)
        at org.apache.xerces.framework.XMLParser.parse(XMLParser.java:948)
        at org.apache.xalan.transformer.TrAXFilter.parse(TrAXFilter.java:134)
        at org.apache.fop.apps.Driver.render(Driver.java:459)
        at org.apache.fop.apps.CommandLineStarter.run(CommandLineStarter.java:72
)
        at org.apache.fop.apps.Fop.main(Fop.java:19)

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
There is a document and an external image missing. Apart from this, there
are no problems with the file. 

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 3824 ***

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Ooops, comment incomplete. It triggers the same bug in the MIF renderer
as a previous report.
